attributes.action: The Leave leaders have misled voters & must play no part in Brexit negotiations
attributes.additional_details: The Leave campaign has used legitimate fears and concerns to entrench divisions in a fracturing society.  They have shown deep contempt for the people they purport to represent by using and building on these fears and concerns without any intention of addressing them.
attributes.background: The leaders of the EU Referendum Leave campaign misled voters, claiming a vote for leave would reduce immigration and make £350 million additional funds available for the NHS.  They have now disowned both these statements.  They are therefore not fit to hold public office or to lead this country.
